stories.name: Village Women
stories.text: A group of women in a small village had a home business but no documents to sell online. Khulega.online helped them â€” got their documents ready and onboarded them on Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho and more.

stories.name: Ramesh â€” Makhana Seller
stories.text: Ramesh used to sell Makhana from his village, only in the local market. With Khulega.online's help, he and his old friends now sell Makhana online across India.

stories.name: Local Artisan
stories.text: From local market to national reach â€” Khulega.online helped artisans get online and reach customers everywhere.

sellerJourney.label: How It Works
sellerJourney.title: Your Journey from
sellerJourney.subtitle: Six simple steps to launch your business across every major marketplace in India

steps.title: Register on Our Platform
steps.desc: Click the Register button to visit usc.khulega.online and create your account in minutes. No complex paperwork â€” just a simple signup to get started.

steps.title: Submit Your Seller Application
steps.desc: Complete your seller profile with basic business details and submit your application for review. Our team verifies and approves applications promptly.

steps.title: Access Your Seller Dashboard
steps.desc: Once approved, your dashboard unlocks all seller tools â€” marketplace connectors, inventory management, order tracking, and analytics â€” all in one place.

steps.title: Get Expert Assistance
steps.desc: Need help with documentation, branding, or compliance? Request services directly from your dashboard. Our team will guide you through every requirement to go live.

steps.title: Connect Your Marketplaces
steps.desc: Link Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, ONDC, JioMart, and more from a single dashboard. Upload your product catalogue once and publish across all platforms simultaneously.

steps.title: Start Selling & Earning
steps.desc: Your products are now live across every connected marketplace. Manage orders, track performance, and scale your business â€” all from one unified platform.

ourServices.heading: Everything You Need to
ourServices.intro: From business registration to order management â€” we handle every aspect of your online selling journey

registration.title: e-PAN Card
registration.detail: Get your business PAN card digitally without visiting any office. Required for GST and marketplace registration.

registration.title: GST Registration
registration.shortDesc: Mandatory for online selling on marketplaces
registration.detail: Complete GST registration with ARN generation. Required to sell on Amazon, Flipkart, and other marketplaces.

registration.title: Udyam Registration
registration.detail: Register your business under MSME to avail government benefits, subsidies, and marketplace priority listing.

registration.title: FSSAI License
registration.detail: Mandatory food safety license for sellers dealing in food items, beverages, supplements, and consumable goods.

registration.title: Taxation Support
registration.detail: Regular GST return filing, tax computation, and compliance support to keep your business running smoothly.

branding.title: Brand Identity Design
branding.detail: Professional brand identity package including business name suggestions, logo design, marketplace banners, and a compelling tagline.

branding.title: Product Photography
branding.detail: High-quality product photography on white background, lifestyle shots, and infographic images optimized for marketplace listings.

branding.title: AI Product Images
branding.detail: Leverage AI technology to create stunning product images, background removal, lifestyle mockups, and A+ content visuals.

branding.title: Product Metadata
branding.detail: SEO-optimized product titles, bullet points, descriptions, and backend keywords to maximize your product visibility and search ranking.

branding.title: AI Content Writing
branding.detail: Use AI to generate compelling product descriptions, bullet points, and A+ content that converts browsers into buyers.

branding.title: Quality Check
branding.detail: Ensure your products meet marketplace quality standards and compliance requirements before listing.

marketplace.title: Marketplace Onboarding
marketplace.shortDesc: Account setup on all major platforms
marketplace.detail: Complete seller account creation and verification on Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, JioMart, and ONDC marketplaces.

marketplace.title: Khulega.online Listing
marketplace.shortDesc: List products on our own marketplace
marketplace.detail: Get your products listed on Khulega.online powered by ONDC network, reaching customers across India.

marketplace.title: Product Listing
marketplace.detail: Bulk product listing with optimized content across all connected marketplaces from one dashboard.

marketplace.title: Pricing Strategy
marketplace.detail: Data-driven pricing recommendations considering marketplace fees, competition, and profit margins.

marketplace.title: Seller Training
marketplace.shortDesc: Learn to manage your online business
marketplace.detail: Comprehensive training on dashboard usage, order management, inventory handling, and marketplace best practices.

operations.title: Order Management
operations.detail: Track, process, and fulfill orders from all marketplaces in one dashboard. Never miss an order again.

operations.title: Inventory Management
operations.detail: Automated inventory synchronization to prevent overselling and stockouts across all connected platforms.

operations.title: Shipping & Logistics
operations.detail: Integrated shipping solutions with label generation, tracking, and delivery management for all orders.

operations.title: Returns & Refunds
operations.detail: Streamlined return management with automated refund processing and return analytics across platforms.

operations.title: Settlement & Payments
operations.detail: Monitor your earnings, settlement cycles, deductions, and payment reconciliation across all marketplaces.

operations.title: Digital Marketing & Ads
operations.detail: Marketplace ads management, social media marketing, and digital campaigns to drive traffic and increase sales.

operations.title: Reporting & Analytics
operations.detail: Consolidated sales reports, performance analytics, and business intelligence across all connected platforms.

operations.title: Marketplace Support
operations.detail: Expert assistance for marketplace issues including account health, policy violations, and performance optimization.
